<h3 id="X10902">X(10902)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EXTANGENTS AND KOSNITA</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^4*(a-b-c)-(2*b^2+b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+(2*b^2-b*c+2*c^2)*(b+c)*a^2+(b^3+c^3)*(b+c)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b^3-c^3))  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(10902) = R*X(1)+2*(R+r)*X(3)
</b>
<p>
Let A'B'C' be the triangle formed by the radical axes of the incircle and the Odehnal tritangent circles, as defined at X(3822).  A'B'C' is homothetic to the 1st circumperp triangle at X(10902).  (Randy Hutson, December 10, 2016)
</p>
<p>
X(10902) lies on these lines:{1,3}, {2,6796}, {4,3822}, {5,5259}, {10,1006}, {15,10637}, {16,10636}, {19,24}, {21,515}, {31,581}, {39,10315}, {42,580}, {47,2003}, {54,71}, {100,5178}, {104,5267}, {109,4303}, {110,7724}, {140,3925}, {182,3779}, {186,6197}, {191,912}, {225,7412}, {283,947}, {355,5251}, {371,5416}, {372,5415}, {376,10532}, {380,8557}, {386,602}, {404,10165}, {405,5587}, {411,946}, {442,5842}, {497,6988}, {498,6827}, {499,6954}, {516,3651}, {575,8539}, {595,1064}, {601,991}, {631,2550}, {902,4300}, {944,993}, {952,5258}, {958,5881}, {960,6326}, {971,7701}, {1001,3149}, {1005,6260}, {1030,8609}, {1125,6905}, {1147,6237}, {1158,10884}, {1203,5396}, {1283,9840}, {1376,5705}, {1478,6868}, {1479,6825}, {1490,4512}, {1658,8141}, {1698,6883}, {1699,6985}, {1802,3730}, {2266,4253}, {2361,2594}, {2801,3647}, {2915,9625}, {2975,5882}, {3011,4220}, {3074,4551}, {3085,6987}, {3101,7488}, {3145,8235}, {3189,5657}, {3522,10587}, {3523,10527}, {3524,10806}, {3528,10597}, {3530,6154}, {3560,5691}, {3583,6842}, {3585,7491}, {3624,6911}, {3683,5777}, {3814,6902}, {4189,5450}, {4294,6908}, {4297,6906}, {4302,6850}, {4330,5840}, {4423,6918}, {5047,10175}, {5218,6865}, {5284,6915}, {5432,6922}, {5552,6992}, {5603,6876}, {5620,6011}, {5663,6097}, {5715,7580}, {6254,6759}, {6256,6872}, {6284,6907}, {6642,9816}, {6690,6831}, {6863,7741}, {6880,10200}, {6928,7951}, {6936,10786}, {7967,8666}, {8722,10804}, {9537,10298}, {10282,10536}</p>
<p>
X(10902) = circumcircle-inverse-of-X(5535)<br>
X(10902) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,165,5709), (1,10268,40), (3,35,2077), (3,40,7688), (3,55,40), (3,1385,36), (3,3295,3428), (3,10267,1), (3,10269,7280), (3,10306,5584), (71,2302,2323), (100,6986,6684), (165,6769,40), (411,1621,946), (944,6875,993), (1001,3149,8227), (1385,3579,5885), (3295,3428,7982), (3579,7957,40), (4189,5731,5450), (5010,7987,3), (5217,8273,3), (5584,10306,40)<br>
</p>
